import "./list.scss" import { ArrowBackIosOutlined, ArrowForwardIosOutlined } from "@material-ui/icons" import Listitem from "../listitem/Listitem" import { useRef } from "react" export default function List() { const listRef = useRef() const handelClick = (direction)=>{ let distance = listRef.current.getBoundingClientRect() if(direction === "left"){ listRef.current.style.transform = `translateX(230px)` } console.log(distance); } return (

handelClick("left")}/>
